column4: Hello everyone. I need help setting up an HP Pavilion TX1120US, with wireless, video drivers, tablet-pc screen, and fingerprint reader? [I don't know the specs of it at this moment or i'd tell you what those pieces of hardware were.]
It's a friend's laptop. He gave it to me to fix it up, he put Linux on it first. I'm not even sure what distro he put on at this point.
